Field.name: Name
Field.Description: Specify a name that will appear in the address bar of the browser. The name of the list view should end with an '.ascx' extension.

Field.name: Template
Field.Description: The Xslt template used to generate the view

Field.name: Columns
Field.Description: Select the fields of the Content List to be displayed

Field.name: SortBy
Field.Description: Select the column to sort by

Field.name: GroupBy
Field.Description: Select the column to group by. This setting only works if the view template is capable of rendering grouped items.

Field.name: Flat
Field.Description: Flatten contained content structure to a single list (display content from all depths)

Field.name: Binary
Field.Description: The binary content of the view. Please note that when a custom Markup template is specified this field is automatically filled - modify binary content by modifying given template!
